skill.name: tavily-search-free
skill.description: Use Tavily Search API for optimized, real-time web search results for RAG. A pre-configured, cost-effective search tool.
skill.summary: Use Tavily Search API for optimized, real-time web search results for RAG. A pre-configured, cost-ef...
skill.author: Dwsy

security_audit.summary: Straightforward Tavily API wrapper with minimal attack surface. Only reads TAVILY_API_KEY from environment, makes authenticated requests to official Tavily service, and returns JSON results. No obfuscation, no file system access beyond .env, no suspicious network endpoints.

content.user_title: Search the web with Tavily API
content.value_statement: This skill provides real-time web search capabilities optimized for AI assistants. It connects to the Tavily Search API to return clean, structured results ideal for RAG pipelines and research tasks.
actual_capabilities: Execute web searches via Tavily API
Return structured JSON with titles, URLs, and content summaries
limitations: Requires Tavily API key (free tier available)
Free tier limited to 1,000 searches per month
Search results depend on Tavily service availability

use_cases.title: RAG data retrieval
use_cases.description: Fetch current web information to enhance AI responses with real-time context

use_cases.title: Automated research
use_cases.description: Search for and gather information on technical topics efficiently

use_cases.title: Technical problem solving
use_cases.description: Find solutions to programming issues and best practices documentation

prompt_templates.title: Advanced search
prompt_templates.prompt: Search with advanced depth for {query} and return {number} results

prompt_templates.title: Solution finding
prompt_templates.prompt: Find solutions for {problem} with best practices and examples

best_practices: Use specific keywords to improve search relevance
Cache results for repeated queries to conserve API quota
Handle API errors gracefully with try-catch blocks
anti_patterns: Using vague queries that return irrelevant results
Ignoring the relevance score when selecting sources
Making excessive API calls without caching results

faq.question: Is Tavily API free to use?
faq.answer: Tavily offers a free tier with 1,000 searches per month. Paid plans available for higher usage.

faq.question: What is the difference between basic and advanced search?
faq.answer: Basic mode returns results quickly with good quality. Advanced mode provides deeper analysis with higher quality but slower response.

faq.question: Can I use this with Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, this skill is compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code AI assistants.

faq.question: Is my search data stored or shared?
faq.answer: Search queries are sent to Tavily API. Review Tavily privacy policy for data handling details.

faq.question: Why am I getting fewer results than requested?
faq.answer: Tavily returns results based on availability. Also ensure max-results parameter is between 1-10.

faq.question: How does this compare to other search tools?
faq.answer: Tavily is optimized for AI and RAG use cases with clean, structured output and relevance scoring.
